channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- spice-vdagent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- spice-vdagent

item.title: CVE-2017-15108|2024-08-05T19:50:15.989Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- spice-vdagent
item.description: spice-vdagent up to and including 0.17.0 does not properly escape save directory before passing to shell, allowing local attacker with access to the session the agent runs in to inject arbitrary commands to be executed.
